ygData.subject: Re: ROBES
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, the really cool black robes with a red design on the front of them can only be found in Najena.  A Dungeon off of LavaStorm that is pretty tough.  A
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, the really cool black robes with a red design on the front of them
can only be found in Najena. A Dungeon off of LavaStorm that is pretty
tough. A Necromancer holds them at the bottom of the dungeon. Haven't been
able to get to the bottom yet though and I'm 21st!! It will be a little
while before we see these robes I think ;)

Talarin, High Elven Wizard
